page.title: 07Employment in S/W Dartmoor
page.content: There are two main villages in our area,they are {Shaugh Prior and {Clearbrook}.There are more amenities in Shaugh Prior and more people work there. There is a{Garage in Shaugh {Prior}and from three to seven men work there at any one time.The Garage does most jobs,repairs and sells cars. There is a{Clay Works at Cadover, } about 250 people work there.They have to work the monitors,drive the dumpers and work the other machinery. There are two teachers,a cook, dinner-lady and a secretary who work in our{ {School.}There are{two Post Offices,and {two Pubs.in our area.}In{Shaugh Prior {Post Office}the two owners work,together with another man who repairs watches.Many people in our area go to{Plymouth}to work,and some work on{Farms.}
